about_the_game:
It’s 2050 and your first day at the astounding Aqli Academy for Gifted Children where you’ll meet your new brainiac buddies Khalid, Layla, Abdullah, and Aysha.


They need YOUR help investigating a mysterious machine that unexpectedly unleashes a crash course in history! You’ll be hopping back in time from the 7th to 15th century and adventuring across 7 lovingly recreated locales along the Silk Road!

But watch out, there are dastardly, diabolical villains trying to change the course of time and the fate of history is at stake! The Time Hoppers will need to stop the machinations of the mad alchemist, Dr. Fasid, and his maniacal minions!

The Time Hoppers are prepared with technological tools and futuristic techniques to overcome whatever they encounter! Wander across wild desert wastes and whimsical cities in the wondrous ancient worlds waiting for you! Curiosity is richly rewarded with troves of treasure and nuggets of knowledge.

Features


-Learn real ancient knowledge from real historical figures while bamboozling bad guys and abnormal alchemical abominations.
-Packed full of peculiar puzzles, creative challenges, quirky quests, and minigames so you have non-stop new stuff to do!
-Your skills and wits will be put to the test to uncover the treacherous tale of Dr. Fasid’s terrifying timeline!
-Show off some of your special spoils in your customizable base back at the Academy!
-Fully voice acted to bring the colorful collection of characters to life! Younger Hoppers can follow along easily too!
-Comic-style cutscenes expand on exciting moments!
-Adorable, hand-crafted aesthetic is optimized to run silky-smooth, even on low-end hardware.

name: Time Hoppers: The Silk Road Demo
short_description: Time Hoppers: The Silk Road is a time-traveling, mind-expanding, action-adventure RPG for all ages! Embark on an epic journey through the Golden Age of the Silk Road and save real scientists who changed the world. The enigmatic evil Dr. Fasid has sinister schemes up his sleeve, though.
